price: 55. « Es-tu venu nous apporter la vérité, dirent-ils, ou es-tu en train de plaisanter ? »
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqi am anta mina al-lāʿibīna
